biography: Simo is a highly accomplished golfer, a member of Hirsala Golf, and a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, having competed in the tournament since 2022.  His passion for the game is undeniable, though some might say his colorful language on the course is equally as memorable.

A three-time Hector Trophée champion, Simo's wins in 2021, 2022 and the inaugural Hector Trophée V cemented his status as a force to be reckoned with.  While he's yet to claim the Victor trophy for individual performance, his consistent appearances and remarkable record in the team competition speak volumes about his talent and competitive spirit.  It would be unwise for other competitors to underestimate his prowess.

Known for his aggressive style of play and his ability to perform under pressure, Simo brings an electrifying presence to the Hector Trophée every year.  His dedication to the game, coupled with his unique personality, makes him a crowd favorite and a player others carefully watch.
